title: Mastering Image Uploads with Spring Boot & Cloudinary
content:
Why Cloudinary?

Managing images in a modern web application can be tricky. You have to worry about storage, optimization, and delivery speeds. That's where Cloudinary comes in.

Cloudinary provides a comprehensive cloud-based image and video management solution.

Step 1: The Setup

First, we add the dependency to our pom.xml. This allows our Spring Boot application to communicate with Cloudinary's powerful API.

  • Add Dependency
  • Configure Keys
  • Create Service

And just like that, we have secure, scalable image uploads!
